query:
SELECT 'Total alunos cadastrados' as metrica, COUNT(*) as valor FROM alunos
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Alunos com mentoria', COUNT(DISTINCT alunoId) FROM mentoring_sessions
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Alunos sem mentoria', COUNT(*) FROM alunos WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT alunoId FROM mentoring_sessions)
command:

UNION ALL

UNION ALL
SELECT 'Alunos sem mentoria', COUNT(*) FROM alunos WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT alunoId FROM mentoring_sessions)
